titleStmt.title: By the Queene a proclamation to be published in Cornewall, Deuonshire, Dorcetshire and Hampshire, for restitution of goods lately taken on the seas from the subiects of the king of Spayne by way of reprisall.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, Printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at our Palace of Westminster the nine and twentieth day of December, in the foure and thirtieth yeere of our Raigne. 1591."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
